original: Kirudd, Bror Nils Robert, leg. läkare, Amål, f. 22/1/12 i Jukkasjärvi, Norrb. 1., av grossh. Bror K. o. Sofia Eriksson. G. 43 m. Runa Haerén. — Stud:ex. i Uddevalla 30, med. kand. i Lund 34, med. lic. 40. Assist :läk. v. Lunds las. med. klin. 39, tf. andre und :’lak. v. Nyköp. las. kir. avd. 40, e. o. aman. v. röntgendiagn. avd. v. las. i Lund 41, tf. andre läk. v. Kälisha-gens sjukh. 41, tf. andre und :läk. v. Vänersb. las. kir. avd. 42, v. dess med. avd. 43, tf. stadsläk. i Amål 44. Priv:-prakt. läk. i Amål sed. 44, skolläk. där fr. s. å., järnvägsläk. fr. 47. Led. av stadsfuilm.
translated: Kirudd, Bror Nils Robert, certified physician, Amål, born on January 22, 1912 in Jukkasjärvi, Norrbotten County, 1st child of merchant Bror K. and Sofia Eriksson. Married in 1943 to Runa Haerén. - Graduated from high school in Uddevalla in 1930, received Bachelor of Medicine degree in Lund in 1934, and became a licensed physician in 1940. Worked as an assistant physician at Lund Hospital's medical clinic from 1939, acting second assistant physician at Nyköping Hospital's surgical department in 1940, temporary assistant at the radiology department of Lund Hospital in 1941, acting second physician at Kälishagen Hospital in 1941, acting second assistant physician at Vänersborg Hospital's surgical department in 1942, at its medical department in 1943, and as acting town physician in Amål in 1944. Started a private practice as a physician in Amål since 1944, also worked as a school physician there from the same year, and as a railway physician from 1947. Member of the City Film Society.
